title: Lord of the flies [a discussion]
creator_credit: David Zweck and Country Education Project
brief_description: Dennis O’Hearn of Melbourne University discusses what Golding is doing in his novel “Lord of the Flies”, how he goes about it, how successful he is, and using key passages from the book, helps students to see the text in its proper perspective.
